name: ClassRealm
blurb: ClassRealm is a customizable classroom management system built on role playing themes. It's like a real life video game for kids!

rewards.reward: A printable ClassRealm bookmark and our undying gratitude.
Previous reward plus a ClassRealm bumper sticker of your choosing. The knowledge that you're helping students the world over.

Previous rewards plus ClassRealm+ access for three months (once launched), and a vote in our ClassRealm Race Election, weekly e-mail updates on ClassRealm's progress, one ClassRealm: Math Monsters! card by Alice Carroll chosen at random.  Virtual high five!

Previous rewards plus an extra ClassRealm+ access pass for a friend also good for three months, one booster pack of 7 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll. We really like you. Bonus! - The first 50 people to pledge $50 get the limited edition ClassRealm shirt! (Add $5 for international orders)

Previous rewards plus an extra ClassRealm+ access pass for a friend also good for three months, one booster pack of 7 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll. We really like you.

Previous rewards plus ClassRealm+ access for six months (once launched), your name on ClassRealm's official \u201cThank You" page, two booster packs of 7 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll. Bonus - 200 lucky folks will also get a superb ClassRealm t-shirt! (Add $5 for international orders)

Previous rewards plus ClassRealm+ access for six months (once launched), your name on ClassRealm's official \u201cThank You" page, two booster packs of 7 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll. Your efforts shall not go unrewarded!

Previous rewards plus ClassRealm+ access for a year (once launched), you get to pick a fantasy/sci-fi race and we\u2019ll include it on the site eventually (nothing trademarked), one deck of 25 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll and the limited edition t-shirt. You are a truly caring individual.

Previous rewards plus you get to pick a fantasy/sci-fi race AND an enhancer, limited edition "Art of ClassRealm" book, two decks of 25 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll. We wish we could hug you.

Previous rewards plus ClassRealm+ access for you and 3 friends for a year! Illustrator Alice Carroll will illustrate your likeness as a ClassRealm citizen in a personalized piece of art, special edition Sami the Samurai Yeti Math Monsters! trading card. You are an amazing person!

Previous rewards plus ClassRealm+ access FOR LIFE! Illustrator Alice Carroll will illustrate you and a friends likeness as ClassRealm citizens in a personalized piece of art. You also get an achievement named after you! We will make sure every students knows how much you helped the world of ClassRealm. You are now our best friend forever.

WHAT!? You're really going to back us $10,000!? You get everything listed in the other reward tiers AND ClassRealm+ access FOR LIFE for you and six friends, a special part of the Thank You page dedicated to just you, seven decks of 25 limited edition ClassRealm: Math Monsters! cards by Alice Carroll, not to mention every new Math Monsters! card produced beyond the first run. Alice will illustrate you a personalized piece of art of anything your heart desires. Words can not describe how truly amazing you are.
